code: import{MOVE_OBJECTS,SHOOT,START_GAME}from'../actions';import moveObjects from'./moveObjects';import startGame from'./startGame';import shoot from'./shoot';var initialGameState={started:false,kills:0,lives:3,flyingObjects:[],lastObjectCreatedAt:new Date(),cannonBalls:[]};var initialState={angle:45,gameState:initialGameState};function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case MOVE_OBJECTS:return moveObjects(state,action);case START_GAME:return startGame(state,initialGameState);case SHOOT:return shoot(state,action);default:return state;}}export default reducer;
